actionCards.title: My Certificate
actionCards.description: Download your official NMGS membership certificate

actionCards.title: Find Internships
actionCards.description: Browse exclusive SIWES and internship opportunities

actionCards.title: Partner Pathways
actionCards.description: Join professional bodies with guided applications

actionCards.title: Find Your Chapter
actionCards.description: Connect with students at other institutions

partners.headline: Partner Pathways
partners.description: Get step-by-step guidance to join senior professional organizations. Your NMGS membership can serve as proof of student status.

organizations.name: Nigerian Mining and Geosciences Society
benefits: Access to exclusive scholarships up to ₦500,000

requirements.text: Must be in 300 Level or above
Requires Head of Department recommendation letter
Valid student ID or admission letter

steps.title: Gather Your Documents
steps.description: Collect all required documents including your NMGS certificate, student ID, passport photos, and HOD recommendation letter.

steps.title: Visit the Official Portal
steps.description: Go to the NMGS Professional registration portal and create an account using your institutional email.

steps.title: Select Student Membership
steps.description: Choose the 'Student Member' category. This has reduced fees and modified requirements for students.

steps.title: Upload Documents
steps.description: Upload your NMGS certificate as proof of student status, along with other required documents.

steps.title: Pay Registration Fee
steps.description: Pay the student membership fee of ₦15,000 via the portal. Keep your receipt for records.

steps.title: Await Verification
steps.description: Your application will be reviewed within 2-3 weeks. You'll receive confirmation via email.

organizations.name: Society of Petroleum Engineers
benefits: Access to SPE technical papers and resources

steps.title: Create SPE Account
steps.description: Visit spe.org and create a free account using your institutional email address.

steps.title: Apply for Student Membership
steps.description: Navigate to membership and select 'Student Member'. Fill in your academic details.

steps.title: Get Faculty Endorsement
steps.description: Request your faculty advisor or HOD to endorse your application via the system.

steps.title: Pay Membership Dues
steps.description: Student membership is $25 USD annually. Payment can be made via card.

steps.title: Join Local Chapter
steps.description: Once approved, join your university's SPE student chapter for local activities.

organizations.name: Nigerian Institute of Mining and Geosciences

steps.title: Verify Eligibility
steps.description: Confirm you're in final year or postgraduate level and have completed SIWES.

steps.title: Find Two Referees
steps.description: Identify two existing NIMG members who can provide references. Ask lecturers or industry contacts.

steps.title: Download Application Form
steps.description: Get the Graduate Student application form from the NIMG website.

steps.title: Submit Application Package
steps.description: Submit completed form with transcript, NMGS certificate, SIWES letter, and referee details.

steps.title: Attend Interview
steps.description: If shortlisted, attend a brief interview with the membership committee.

steps.title: Pay and Receive Card
steps.description: Upon approval, pay ₦25,000 and receive your Graduate Student membership card.

organizations.name: Geological Society of Africa
benefits: Free access to African geology journals

steps.title: Visit GSAf Portal
steps.description: Go to the Geological Society of Africa website and find the membership section.

steps.title: Complete Online Form
steps.description: Fill the student membership form with your academic and contact details.

steps.title: Upload Student Proof
steps.description: Upload your NMGS certificate or student ID as proof of enrollment.

steps.title: Submit Application
steps.description: Submit and wait for confirmation. Student membership is completely free!

chapters.headline: Chapter Directory
chapters.description: Connect with NMGS chapters across Nigerian universities. Reach out to chapter executives for local events and networking.

council.headline: The National Executive Council
council.description: Meet the elected leaders guiding NMGS. They represent 12,000+ students and work to secure opportunities for all members.

executives.name: Engr. Chukwuemeka Obi
executives.bio: Final year Geology student with a passion for sustainable mining. Led multiple advocacy campaigns for student welfare.

executives.name: Aisha Mohammed
executives.bio: Mining Engineering student focused on women in mining initiatives and chapter development across northern Nigeria.

executives.name: David Adeleke
executives.bio: Geophysics student with strong organizational skills. Manages all official communications and documentation.

executives.name: Grace Nwachukwu
executives.bio: Petroleum Geology student ensuring transparent financial management and proper allocation of association funds.

executives.name: Yusuf Bello
executives.bio: Manages NMGS's public image and media relations. Passionate about highlighting student achievements.

executives.name: Blessing Onyekachi
executives.bio: Ensures member welfare and handles grievances. Advocates for better learning conditions nationwide.

resources.headline: Resources & Updates
resources.description: Stay informed with the latest news, upcoming events, and downloadable resources for your academic journey.

items.title: Annual National Conference 2025
items.excerpt: Join over 2,000 students at the biggest gathering of mining and geoscience students in Nigeria. This year's theme: 'Sustainable Mining for Future Generations'.

items.title: New Mining Regulations Released by Federal Ministry
items.excerpt: The Federal Ministry of Mines and Steel Development has released new guidelines that directly affect student internships and SIWES placements in the mining sector.

items.title: 2024 Mineral Distribution Map of Nigeria
items.excerpt: Comprehensive mineral resource map updated with the latest geological survey data. Essential for field work and research projects.

items.title: Scholarship Applications Now Open
items.excerpt: Shell Nigeria is offering 50 scholarships worth ₦500,000 each for outstanding geology and mining students. NMGS members get priority consideration.

items.title: Career Fair: Oil & Gas Edition
items.excerpt: Meet recruiters from Shell, Chevron, TotalEnergies, and 20+ other companies. Bring your CV and NMGS certificate.

items.title: SIWES Report Writing Guide
items.excerpt: Complete guide on how to write an outstanding SIWES report. Includes templates, examples, and common mistakes to avoid.

items.title: NMGS Signs MOU with Nigerian Mining Corporation
items.excerpt: A landmark agreement that will provide 100 annual internship slots exclusively for NMGS members at NMC facilities nationwide.

items.title: Geological Field Equipment Handbook
items.excerpt: Learn about essential field equipment, proper usage, and maintenance. Perfect for students preparing for field trips.

internships.headline: Internships & SIWES
internships.description: Exclusive opportunities from our partner companies. As a verified member, you have priority access to all listings.

listings.description: Join Shell's exploration team and gain hands-on experience in seismic interpretation and well logging.
Work with our mining optimization team on resource estimation and mine planning projects.
Participate in geophysical surveys and data processing under experienced professionals.
Conduct mineral exploration and sampling activities across NMC mining sites in Plateau State.
Join our subsurface team working on reservoir characterization and production optimization.
Learn cement production quality control and laboratory testing procedures.
